full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' STOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
